data.name: Hagia Sophia VR Experience
data.detailed_description:
This Experience allows you to navigate through Hagia Sophia, and by holding Historical Objects, it allows you to listen to Mosaic, History and Quran.

After the Fall of Constantinople to the Ottoman Empire in 1453, it was converted to a mosque by Mehmed the Conqueror. The patriarchate moved to the Church of the Holy Apostles, which became the city's cathedral. Although some parts of the city had fallen into disrepair, the cathedral had been maintained with funds set aside for this purpose, and the Christian cathedral made a strong impression on the new Ottoman rulers who conceived its conversion. The bells, altar, iconostasis, ambo and baptistery were removed and relics destroyed. The mosaics depicting Jesus, his mother Mary, Christian saints, and angels were eventually destroyed or plastered over. Islamic architectural features were added, such as a minbar (pulpit), four minarets, and a mihrab – a niche indicating the direction of prayer (qibla). From its initial conversion until the construction in 1616 of the nearby Sultan Ahmed Mosque, aka the Blue Mosque, it was the principal mosque of Istanbul.

data.short_description: Hagia Sophia literally Holy Mosque of Hagia Sophia the Grand, and formerly the Church of Hagia Sophia, is a Late Antique place of worship in Istanbul, designed by the Greek geometers Isidore of Miletus and Anthemius of Tralles.

data.ai_description:
Step into history with our immersive VR experience at Hagia Sophia! Navigate through this iconic landmark and interact with historical objects to learn about its rich mosaic history and the Quran.

After Constantinople fell to the Ottoman Empire in 1453, Hagia Sophia was transformed into a mosque by Mehmed the Conqueror. Despite some parts of the city being in disrepair, the cathedral had been well-maintained and left a strong impression on the new rulers. Changes included the removal of Christian elements like the bells and altar, and the addition of Islamic features such as a minbar, four minarets, and a mihrab. From its conversion until the completion of the Blue Mosque in 1616, Hagia Sophia was Istanbul's principal mosque.

Perfect for a family-friendly adventure, this VR experience at our café combines education, history, and fun in a captivating journey through time.

data.name: Colibri XR Immersive Art Gallery
data.detailed_description:
Colibri XR immersive art gallery is dedicated to promoting compassion, growing empathy, caring and kindness through virtual reality art. It is the room to listen to the stories told by drawings, soak into creative energy all around you, explore like children with their crayons, feel the joy of colours, tap into the power of feelings and emotions, fill the space with soul warming creations ... experience art with purpose.

Part 1 "Estrella. The Gift"
The illustrated story is inspired by the ancient Inca traditions, the mystical world of the Q‘ero shamans from the sacred valley of Peruvian Andes. A girl Estrella is searching for the lost Inca's treasure, the star of gold, that is believed to provide supernatural multi-talents and turn all dreams into being. She meets Laika, a powerful shaman, who invites the helpers on her journey, the sacred spirit animals. The spirits invite Estrella to extraordinary locations in the Under World, Middle World and Upper World. She follows the spirits of the Serpents, who whisper about the concealed knowledge they keep. The spirits of the Jaguar and the Puma cast a spell of a sudden transformation and Estrella gets lost on the way, however she is brave enough to continue the journey. She travels across the ocean with tiny courageous spirits of Hummingbirds, and explores the vast space with the spirits of the Eagle and the Condor. The girl finally meets the Father Sky and the Mother Earth, who tell her the story of their love, and give her a gift of a guiding star. Her feelings of powerlessness and fear disappear, and in their place arise courage, curiosity, and creativity. The star guides her home and magically becomes a golden necklace around Estrella's neck. The girl recognizes she found the treasure ...  all her multiple gifts were always with her, now reawakened.

Part 2 "The River and The Clouds"
The illustrated poem is inspired by Zen Master, a poet and peace activist Thich Nhat Hanh:
"Once upon a time there was a beautiful River... One day she noticed the clouds within herself. Clouds of all sorts of colors and forms. She did nothing during these days but chase after clouds. She wanted to possess a cloud, to have one for herself. But clouds float and travel in the sky, and they are always changing their form. Sometimes they look like an overcoat, sometimes like a horse. Because of the nature of impermanence within the clouds, the River suffered very much. Her pleasure, her joy had become just chasing after clouds, one after another, but despair, anger, and hatred became her life. Then one day a strong wind came and blew away all the clouds in the sky. The sky became completely empty.... That night was the first opportunity for her to hear her own crying, the sounds of water crashing against the banks of the River. Because she was able to listen to her own voice, she discovered something quite important. She realized that what she had been looking for was already in herself. She found out that clouds are nothing but water. Clouds are born from water and will return to water. And she found out she herself was also water... When she opened her heart completely to the evening sky she received the image of the full Moon - beautiful, round, like a jewel within herself... The fresh and beautiful Moon is traveling in the utmost empty sky. When the mind-rivers of living beings are free, that image of the beautiful Moon will reflect in each of us. This was the mind of the river at that moment. She received the image of that beautiful Moon within her heart, and water, clouds, and the Moon took each other's hands and practiced walking meditation slowly, slowly to the ocean..."

Part 3 "Pebble Meditation" is inspired by Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh:
“Breathing in, I see myself as a flower.
Breathing out, I feel fresh.
Breathing in, I see myself as a mountain.
Breathing out, I feel solid.
Breathing in, I see myself as still water.
Breathing out, I reflect things as they truly are.
Breathing in, I see myself as space.
Breathing out, I feel free.”

data.ai_description:
**Colibri XR Immersive Art Gallery**

Welcome to Colibri XR, an enchanting virtual reality art gallery dedicated to fostering compassion, empathy, and creativity. Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant art and heartwarming stories, perfect for families and children to explore together.

**Part 1: "Estrella. The Gift"**
Join Estrella on a magical journey inspired by ancient Inca traditions and the mystical world of the Qero shamans. As she searches for the legendary star of gold, she encounters powerful spirit animals like Serpents, Jaguars, Pumas, Hummingbirds, Eagles, and Condors. These guides lead her through extraordinary locations, helping her overcome fears and discover her innate talents. With courage and curiosity, Estrella learns that the true treasure lies within her.

**Part 2: "The River and The Clouds"**
Inspired by the teachings of Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh, this illustrated poem tells the story of a River chasing ever-changing clouds. Through this journey, she learns the beauty of impermanence and discovers that everything she sought was always within her. The River finds peace and harmony, reflecting the serene image of the Moon in her waters.

**Part 3: "Pebble Meditation"**
Also inspired by Thich Nhat Hanh, this part guides you through a calming meditation. Breathe in and see yourself as a flower, a mountain, still water, and space. Each breath helps you feel fresh, solid, reflective, and free.

Bring your family to Colibri XR and explore these profound and beautiful stories together, experiencing art with a purpose in a fun and engaging VR setting.

data.name: The Last Dance Saloon
data.detailed_description:
Bounty hunters are after you. Again.

The Last Dance Saloon is a gun-toting, time-looping, rhythm-based shootout at the edge of the known universe. Every time you wake up at the bar, they're waiting outside to blast you to bits. Every time you die, they all come back. Every new loop is a chance to do it right.

You're up against an army out there, but that's only made you stronger.

One day, you'll bring them all down.

Features

  • Dual-Wielded Revolvers: Enemies are vulnerable to green or blue lasers. You've got both.
  • Quantum Meddling: The exact types of enemies you'll encounter are different every loop.
  • Drinks on the House: Consume alcohol to gain temporary abilities. That's how it works.
  • Leaderboards: Test yourself against your friends and the top players of the world.

**Features:**
- **Dual-Wielded Lasers:** Use your green and blue lasers to target different types of enemies.
- **Varied Challenges:** Encounter a new mix of enemies with each loop to keep the game exciting.
- **Power-Ups:** Gain temporary abilities to help you in your quest.
- **Leaderboards:** Compete with friends and top players worldwide.

Perfect for a family-friendly VR café, this game offers excitement and strategic fun for all ages.

data.name: A Clever Label
data.detailed_description:
There are highly organised, well-connected, well-funded, secretive organisations using Christianity as a smokescreen and LGBTQI people as a focus for fear, uncertainty and doubt, in order to wield hidden influence on the social and democratic fabric of Australia.

A Clever Label is a documentary experience that enables audiences to unearth hidden connections between anti-equality lobbyists, senior Australian politicians and international organisations. Unlike a traditional documentary with a fixed narrative and one-way communication, Documentary host Michela Ledwidge invites audiences to independently follow threads that intrigue them to form their own conclusions.

At the height of the Safe Schools debate in 2016 queer trans woman Michela Ledwidge walked past a rally at Town Hall where 15-year old children spoke of the suicide of one of their classmates. This is the week when Australian politicians used parliamentary privilege to equate homosexuality with paedophilia. Michela felt shame at her own ignorance on the debate and wondered why the Australian religious right had such a hold over a supposedly secular society like Australia. She set out to explore the links between anti-LGBTQI lobbyists, senior Australian politicians and international organisations based in the US. Her idea - use the new medium of Virtual Reality to create a space in where complex issues could be explored and digested. In the process she shines a spotlight on decades of rarely reported research that documents the rise of the Australian religious right and on key questions that cut to the heart of our democracy. Who supports these groups? What motivates our politicians? How do echo chambers impact our ability to understand complex issues? Using the Australian Christian Lobby as a starting point, Michela literally "plays" with the data, exploring the literal and figurative threads of financial and political influence on LGBTQI politics as she explores the hidden sources and motivations behind anti-equality messaging. A Clever Label asks the questions and challenges the audience to seek out their own conclusions on some of Australia's most polarizing issues.

Don't have access to desktop VR equipment? Want to share the information with friends who don't have VR? You can find out more about the topics discussed through the podcast!

Soundcloud:
https://soundcloud.com/modstudio

Apple podcasts:
https://podcasts.apple.com/au/podcast/a-clever-label/id1589632091

Spotify:
https://open.spotify.com/show/3qLJp4NBrnNC7xiKGvI5QI

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/acleverlabel

data.ai_description:
**A Clever Label** is an engaging and interactive documentary experience designed for VR, where audiences can delve into the hidden connections between anti-equality lobbyists, senior Australian politicians, and international organizations. Unlike traditional documentaries, this experience allows you to independently explore the issues and form your own conclusions.

Host Michela Ledwidge, a queer trans woman, was inspired to create this documentary after witnessing the emotional impact of the Safe Schools debate in 2016. She aims to uncover the complex relationships and motivations behind anti-LGBTQI messaging in Australia. 

Using the Australian Christian Lobby as a starting point, Michela explores the data and unravels the financial and political threads that influence LGBTQI politics. The documentary invites you to understand the motivations behind these groups and the impact of echo chambers on our society.

For those who don't have access to VR equipment, or want to share the experience with friends, more information is available through a podcast on Soundcloud. Join the conversation and uncover the hidden influences shaping some of Australia's most polarizing issues.

**Find out more and connect with us on Twitter!**

data.name: Operation Insanity
data.detailed_description:
A Para-military Terrrorist organization is running amok . There is only one solution, send a single lone operative on a suicidal mission to stop them. You are that lone operative. Choose your character and lock and load for intense action as you fight your way through ever increasing difficult challenges. As you progress toward level 20 the enemy get tougher and more numerous. Will you be able to rise to the challenge? Are you good enough to complete Operation Insanity?

  • Dynamic missions - each run through of a mission is different. Enemies will be in different placements with different patrols.
  • Increasing Difficulty - each play through the game ramps up the difficulty. Face more and tougher enemies.
  • Challenge Yourself - See how many levels you can complete and view your progress through achievements.

data.ai_description:
Gear up for an exhilarating virtual adventure in "Operation Insanity!" Step into the shoes of a brave lone operative on a mission to thwart a rogue organization. With dynamic missions, no two playthroughs are the same – enemies are always in new locations with different patrols, keeping you on your toes.

As you progress, the challenges increase, with tougher and more numerous adversaries. Test your skills and see how far you can go, earning achievements along the way. Suitable for all ages, "Operation Insanity" promises an action-packed experience perfect for a VR café setting. Can you rise to the challenge? Dive in and find out!

data.name: Go Clubbing
data.detailed_description:
Clubmixed is proud to present Go Clubbing, our fully interactive virtual club.

Experience a night club out from the comfort of your home. With two fabulous rooms, the VIP Sunset Bar and the Underground, immerse yourself with mixes and videos from DJs from all over the world.

Choose the ReadyPlayerMe avatar that best represents you.

Then, head off to the dance floor, dance with other clubbers while listening to the fantastic mixes prepared by our selected DJs, and engage with other clubbers through live audio chat.

We regularly update this experience with new DJ mixes and videos, and we host live events several times a month.

About the Game

Change the way you play VR Golf. Get Ready for the perfect blend of golf physics, skill, and arcade fun. Play alone or online - at any of 12+ stylized golf courses. Control your shots accurately and easily with 3 Club's innovative VR control panel. Take the perfect swing, unlock new challenges, collect great rewards, and have an amazing virtual golf experience.

Earn in-game currency by completing courses, competing online, and accomplishing golf challenges. Create and customize your own multiplayer golfer. Stop by the clubhouse store to spend your game money on new balls, clubs, grips, club covers, hats, outfits for your robot... and much more.


Did we say Robot? Yeah. Of course, a state-of-the-art, customizable robot caddie to help you along your way.

GOLF IN VR... WITH A TWIST

You only have 3 clubs, but that's all you need. A wedge (short distance), an iron (longer), and a putter to help the ball into its hole. Visit one of 12+ hand-crafted original golf courses like a swamp, a horse farm, a desert mine, or even a dome-covered space station. Can you make it across that deep lake? Take a chance and make the perfect shot.


It's always a different day at 3 Club! Never get bored of the same old golf course. Random pin positions give each green an unmatched level of variety. Use your strategy and witts to keep your score low.



3 Club Golf is a part real and part arcade. Your actual swing speed determines the shot. Using a fully interactive, yet simple, VR menu, you can control your ball's movement with actions like slice, hook, backspin, knock-down, flop, and more to get the perfect approach. Use your 3-D mini-map and personal shot camera to track and aim your hits. The wind, weather, wildlife, and other course hazards will challenge even the most skilled golfer. It's like real golf, only more fun! Give it a try.

BASIC SYNOPSIS:

VR Golf... with a robot, where the player can only choose between 3 clubs; a putter, a short wedge, and a long iron. There are 9 holes per course and all holes are par 3 or 4. The player is guided by a robot caddie as they attempt to open up new courses and challenges.

KEY FEATURES

  • 12 unique 9-hole courses to master. (plus additional bonus courses)
  • Customizable clubs, putters, balls, grips, shafts, and more.
  • Play solo, 1v1 online matches, or create a private room to play with a friend.
  • Adjustable swing sensitivity to make it feel just like the real thing.
  • Collect secrets and earn in-game money to spend at the store.
  • Complete challenges to unlock special clubs and items.
  • Random hole placements for maximum replayability.
  • Realistic wind and weather affect ball physics.
  • Driving range, practice green, and mini-games of skill coming soon!
  • Skins game mode coming soon.

data.name: Astroroxx
data.detailed_description:
Astroroxx is for everyone at every age. Surrounding 360° space attacks with virtual asteroids and you have to fight them. Shoot all asteroids within 90 seconds to reach the next level, and defend your high score. Each level features a different space environments and a different music track for the right science fiction mood.

You´re standing on a virtual platform in space and virtual asteroids attack you from all sides. Shooting the, requires aiming well, as you can also destroy the outer shield which protects you from the outside. The platform is protected with a shield, but the platform shield can be destroyed and then you can die if an asteroid hits you.

Bonus items help you to survive the level. Collect shield powerup, platform shield powerup and time freeze bonus items to win a level.

Aim for the highest score and win against all others as the best asteroid space cowboy in our universe.

Current supported VR headsets:
- Oculus Quest 1 (with Link cable)
- Oculus Quest 2 (with Link cable)
- Oculus Rift
- Oculus Rift S
- Windows Mixed Reality headsets

If you wish to get support for your headset, please send us a message via support on our website.

data.ai_description:
**Astroroxx: The Ultimate Family-Friendly VR Space Adventure!**

Step into the thrilling universe of **Astroroxx**, a VR game that’s perfect for all ages! Get ready for an exciting 360-degree space battle where you must defend against virtual asteroids. Sharpen your aim and shoot down all asteroids within 90 seconds to advance through increasingly challenging levels. Each level offers unique space environments and captivating music tracks to set the perfect sci-fi mood.

Stand on a virtual platform in space and fend off asteroid attacks from all directions. Be careful, though—while your platform is protected by a shield, it can be destroyed, leaving you vulnerable to asteroid hits. Collect bonus items like shield power-ups, platform reinforcements, and time-freeze bonuses to help you survive and thrive.

Compete for the highest score and become the ultimate asteroid space cowboy in our universe!

Supported VR headsets include:
- Oculus Quest 1 with Link cable
- Oculus Quest 2 with Link cable
- Oculus Rift
- Oculus Rift S
- Windows Mixed Reality headsets

For additional support or to request compatibility with your headset, visit our website and send us a message. Gather your family and friends for an unforgettable space adventure at your local VR café with **Astroroxx**!

data.name: AB AETERNO
data.detailed_description:
AB AETERNO is a story-driven hardcore survival experience with both well known and brand new survival mechanics designed and polished for VR from the ground up.

ABOUT GAMEPLAY IN VR:

Some game mechanics can be seen in this video : https://youtu.be/Tx3tUgvMU0g
  • Full body and fully customizable avatar.
  • Crafting evolution. Start with resources from 1980s, upgrade your available tech to modern and even futuristic levels as you progress and find unique resources.

  • Intuitive VR gunplay and controls.
  • Mod support, ability to import mp4 files as VHS, mp3s as player tracks, Youtube videos as TV channels, change weapons textures, etc.
  • Intuitive inventory and backpack system
  • Mechanics like cooking, weapon maintenance, welding, soldering, hunting, darts, basketball, arcade machines, photography, drawing and planning mission on your whiteboard, safehouse maintenance, hunting and harvesting anomalies, Interactions with NPCs, puzzle solving, finding stashes, etc.

  • Disassemble, clean, and paint most of the weapons.
  • Persistent objects.
  • Wrist-mounted computer for tracking vitals, navigation assistance, encyclopedia entries about the game's lore, changing game settings, etc.

  • Highly detailed and interactive world elements.
  • Detailed physics interactions, water interaction, underwater physics

SYNOPSIS


When an Alien Artifact crash-landed on Earth, causing mass destruction upon impact, all attempts to make contact failed. When the dust had settled, The Artifact took hostile action, hacking satellites, government databases, Military intranets, everything that it could access. Governments around the World came together, agreeing to co-operate in joint efforts to neutralize the common threat. The United Fleet of NATO, Russia, and China established a no-fly zone around the crash perimeter and world-leading scientists established secret research centers in mobile military bases.

After Intensive research on a mysterious forcefield shrouding the crash site, it became clear that a number of weak points would appear seemingly at random on its surface. All probes the we sent would disappear instantly once across the perimeter, without transmitting any information back. The first expedition of marines and scientists vanished without a trace. Misinformation and secrecy surrounding The Artifact eventually devolved into mass riots, panic, famine, unprecedented economic crisis and suicides rates, and as tension grew, it was decided that we make a preemptive strike using Tsar Bombs. After what seemed to be the first successful attack, The Artifact suddenly emitted a powerful blast, shifting the World back in time. And just like that, humanity simply “forgot” that the incident ever even happened.

Only days before the catastrophic Time-Shift brought on by The Artifact, an experimental new technology, a temporal implant, was implanted in a few hundred human volunteers. They are the few remaining that remember what actually happened. And so The Earth Defense Alliance (EDA) was formed, a shadow government controlled by The Artifact to gain influence across the world under the guise of preparing humanity for alien threats in the near future. As the EDA's influence increased, a faction within the EDA called Sons of Cain (SoC) openly opposed the organization, declaring war, labelling the EDA “alien puppets” who are driving humanity to its extinction. The EDA retaliate, ousting the SoC to the world as a terrorist organization, and so SoC members were hunted and exterminated on sight. Now, 35 years after the Time-Shift event, The Artifact abruptly cuts all commutations channels and its primary protocol is activated. The EDA quickly send a new recon team to investigate. Joining them, a talented Quantum Engineer, James Danziger, who has just arrived back on Earth from the EDA's Intensive Training Facilities on the Moon.

We are planning to add in future:

  • Intriguing and original story with many layers to explore
  • Multiple factions with their own values and goals, YOU decide who will become friend or foe.
  • Many new and Innovative interaction mechanics
  • Upgradeable robot-dog companion
  • Multiple solutions to different problems
  • Free roam, scavenging across open territories
  • Real-time dynamic AI for wild animals and wild life population
  • Hunting
  • Fishing
  • Treasure hunting, stashes, dig/hide minigame (and metal detecting)
  • Trading minigames (different vendors need different approaches)
  • Designing and setting traps
  • Further mod support
  • Additional Acrade games (disks may contain different games with hidden messages)
  • Additional cooking options
  • More weapon customization
  • High quality and adaptive AI
  • Other healing options
  • Safehouse upgrades and customization
  • Global worldwide seasonal events

data.ai_description:
**AB AETERNO** is an immersive, story-driven VR survival game that combines classic and innovative survival mechanics, all designed specifically for virtual reality. 

### **Gameplay in VR**
- **Customizable Avatars**: Create and personalize your full-body avatar.
- **Crafting Evolution**: Start with resources from the 1980s and upgrade your tech to modern and futuristic levels as you find unique resources.
- **Intuitive Controls**: Enjoy VR gunplay, cooking, weapon maintenance, crafting, and more with easy-to-use controls.
- **Mod Support**: Import mp4 files as VHS, mp3s for music tracks, YouTube videos as TV channels, and customize weapon textures.
- **Interactive Environment**: Engage with a highly detailed world, featuring water interaction, detailed physics, and various minigames like darts, basketball, and arcade machines.
- **Persistent Objects**: Items stay where you leave them, adding to the realism.
- **Wrist-mounted Computer**: Track vitals, access navigation assistance, read encyclopedia entries about the game’s lore, and change settings.

### **Story Synopsis**
The game’s plot centers around an **Alien Artifact** that crash-landed on Earth, causing massive disruption and eventually shifting the world back in time. A shadowy organization, the **Earth Defense Alliance (EDA)**, and a rebel faction, the **Sons of Cain (SoC)**, vie for control and the truth behind the Artifact. Players join **James Danziger**, a Quantum Engineer, on a mission to uncover the Artifact’s secrets.

### **Future Plans**
- **Intriguing Story**: Dive into a multi-layered narrative with various factions to align with or oppose.
- **Robot Companion**: Upgradeable robot-dog to assist in your adventures.
- **Open-world Exploration**: Free roam scavenging, hunting, fishing, and treasure hunting.
- **Dynamic AI**: Real-time wildlife and animal behaviors.
- **Trading and Crafting**: Engage in minigames with different vendors and design traps.
- **Mod Support**: Enhanced with additional arcade games, cooking options, weapon customization, and safehouse upgrades.
- **Seasonal Events**: Participate in global events for unique experiences.

**AB AETERNO** promises a rich, interactive, and educational VR experience suitable for all ages, making it a perfect addition to any family-friendly VR café.

data.ai_description: Experience the most realistic RC Plane VR game ever created! Perfect for a family-friendly VR café setting, this game offers six exciting modes and over a dozen planes to choose from. Explore stunning environments like Tuscany and Seaside, race through 12 thrilling courses, and master your skills with five comprehensive training lessons. Enjoy a variety of game modes including Free Flight, Aircraft Carrier Ops, Bird Catcher, Fire Fighter missions, and more. Fly a range of planes, from classic Cessnas to WWII Spitfires and modern jets. With something for everyone, this VR game is sure to provide endless fun for the whole family!

data.name: Night Of The Living Dead VR
data.detailed_description:
You find yourself trapped inside an old farmhouse, surrounded by the undead clamouring to get in. Your only defence is to board up the windows and doors and shoot as many as you can. With the zombie invasion intensifying, you might not make it out alive!

When you’ve had enough zombie mayhem, head down to the basement and flick on the old projector to watch new and exclusive interviews from Night of the Living Dead actors and crew.

Night of the Living Dead VR is an exploratory experience that captures the original spirit of the film in black and white, immersing users in a full-scale 3D recreation of the film’s iconic farmhouse set. Exclusive interviews with film experts and original cast and crew members enrich the experience with insights into the horror classic.

Created with the support of CMF - The Canadian Media Fund

data.ai_description:
Experience the thrill of classic horror with "Night of the Living Dead VR"! Step into a 3D recreation of the iconic farmhouse from the original film, where you can board up windows and doors to defend against the undead. But don't worry, it's all in black and white, capturing the nostalgic spirit of the movie in a family-friendly way.

After you've had your fill of zombie excitement, head to the basement to watch exclusive interviews with the cast and crew, gaining fascinating insights into this horror classic. Created with the support of the Canadian Media Fund, this immersive experience is perfect for VR cafes looking to offer a blend of excitement and education for all ages.

data.name: Purgatory Overkill
data.detailed_description:
"Purgatory Overkill" mixes a shooter and a tower-defense in a VR environnement.
Play as a member of the elite group "OverKill Unit" and shoot your way into hordes of enemies, from tiny skeletons to gigantic demons, to protect interdimensional portals which are at the same time you way home and a way for the monsters to invade your world !
You can count on your military arsenal to fight, be it loads of different weapons or automatic turrets that you can build around the map to avoid getting overwhelmed. But you will have to protect them as much as they are protecting you. How long can you last ?

____________________

STORY :
In the year 2075, after many efforts, humanity managed to create its first interdimensional portal. Since then and for the twenty following years many worlds, until then inaccessible, have been visited by exploration teams under the control of the UN. They brought back knowledge and technology. Visited planets have been classed into three categories: Earths, similar to our world in many aspects; peaceful Paradises; and the dangerous Purgatories where violence and evil reign.
But, like every door, interdimensional portals work both ways and Purgatories inhabitants began to take interest in it. One world known as “Alcion” saw in the portal an occasion to expand its power, not only on Earth, but also on the many planets now connected to our world. UN security team managed to contain the Alcion threat thanks to its tactics and brutal firepower. So much so that it was soon known to the media and the general public as the “OverKill Unit”.
Less than a month after the victory other purgatory worlds began attacking portals and it’s now up to the OverKill Unit to protect Earths and peaceful paradises.
As a member of the OverKill Unit you are to be sent to worlds where lifeforms and universal laws are very different from what you have experienced so far. Your only mission is to protect each world’s portal against the assault of its residents until the command center brings you home and deactivates it. If you fail, the command center will fall in the hands of hostile creatures which could then ravage your home, and many more.

data.ai_description:
**Game Title: Purgatory Overkill**

**Overview:**
Step into an exciting VR adventure that blends shooter action with strategic tower defense in "Purgatory Overkill"! As a member of the elite "OverKill Unit," you'll protect vital interdimensional portals from waves of fantastical enemies, ranging from mischievous skeletons to towering demons. These portals are your way back home and must be defended to prevent monsters from invading.

**Gameplay:**
Arm yourself with a variety of cool weapons and set up automatic turrets around the map to fend off the enemy hordes. You’ll need to protect these turrets as much as they protect you. Test your skills and see how long you can last against the relentless waves!

**Story:**
In 2075, humanity created its first interdimensional portal, opening up incredible new worlds teeming with knowledge and technology. However, some of these worlds, known as Purgatories, are filled with danger and evil. One such world, Alcion, attempts to conquer Earth through these portals. The UN's OverKill Unit, known for their tactical prowess and firepower, successfully defended against this threat.

Now, new Purgatory worlds are attacking, and it's up to you and the OverKill Unit to safeguard Earth's portals. Explore unique worlds with different lifeforms and universal laws, and protect each world's portal until you are safely brought back home.

**Family-Friendly Appeal:**
"Purgatory Overkill" is a thrilling and engaging VR experience suitable for players of all ages at your VR café. With its mix of action and strategy, it offers endless fun and excitement in a safe and controlled environment. Join the OverKill Unit and become a hero by defending our world and many others from the forces of evil. How long can you hold the line? Find out and enjoy the adventure!

data.name: Bingo VR
data.detailed_description:
Aliens. They showed up uninvited. They are taking over. They are everywhere. Earthlings are in trouble. They need to push back and take the fight back to them, to the alien home-world. A stealth super-weapon developed at Area 51 has been proven to deliver on the promise. What is that weapon? BINGO!

Yes, a classic game of BINGO! Play One, Two, or Three BINGO cards! Flick the ball at the matching number on the card to daub. Toss a ball away from the card to discard. Connect a full line of daubs in a row, diagonal, or a column to make a BINGO and get a new card!

How can BINGO! defeat aliens, you ask? It would be too complicated to explain here, but it is awe-inspiring. Aliens don't like losing, and especially when playing BINGO!

Each BINGO! gets earthlings closer to the goal of defeating aliens. Each card is a ticket to success. Make your way to the alien council. Close it out.

data.ai_description:
**Alien Invasion: BINGO Battle**

Aliens have arrived uninvited and are taking over Earth, but humanity has a secret weapon: BINGO! In this thrilling VR game, players can choose to play one, two, or three BINGO cards at once. Flick the ball at the matching number on the card to mark it, or toss it away to discard. Complete a full line of daubs in a row, diagonal, or column to achieve a BINGO and earn a new card.

How can BINGO defeat aliens, you ask? It’s simple yet awe-inspiring! Aliens hate losing, especially in BINGO. Each BINGO brings Earth closer to victory and helps players advance towards the alien council for the ultimate showdown.

Perfect for a family-friendly VR café setting, "Alien Invasion: BINGO Battle" offers fun and excitement for all ages while contributing to the epic battle to save Earth!

data.name: Spartrack VR - Firos
data.detailed_description:
CECI EST UN EXTRAIT. POUR LE JEU COMPLET, RENDEZ-VOUS SUR LE SITE POUR RÉSERVER UNE SÉANCE

Mission Firos est un jeu multijoueur en réalité virtuelle, en déplacement libre, mélangeant énigmes et jeu de tir dans un environnement futuriste.

Nous sommes en 2150 et cela fait plusieurs mois que sur Terre, nous n’avons plus aucune nouvelle des habitants de la planète Firos, nommée ainsi pour sa couleur rouge.

Sur cette planète (dont les conditions atmosphériques sont proches de la Terre), une des plus grandes expéditions jamais menée fut entreprise il y a moins d’un siècle, pour étudier son noyau renfermant une énergie comparable à celle d’une petite étoile et pouvant délivrer une réserve quasiment inépuisable d’énergie.

Une communauté scientifique importante s’était donc installée, et avait trouvé un minerai unique : le Timonium. Ce minerai produit une énergie de grande puissance qui les a aidés à développer un écosystème autonome et hybride, reposant sur la technologie d’une intelligence artificielle très complexe et facilitant la vie des Hommes.

Des dômes gigantesques ont été construits sur la planète afin de créer un environnement similaire à notre planète et permettant d’accélérer davantage l’exploitation de l’énergie de Firos.

A présent, les communications ne fonctionnent plus entre nos deux planètes. Sans aucun moyen de savoir ce qu’il se passe sur place, nous avons fait appel à vous, escadron d’élite, pour retrouver la boîte noire d’un des dômes, actuellement indétectable.

data.ai_description:
**Mission Firos** is an exciting multiplayer virtual reality game featuring free movement, puzzles, and shooting elements in a futuristic setting. The year is 2150, and Earth has lost contact with the inhabitants of the red planet, Firos. 

Decades ago, a major expedition discovered Firos' energy-rich core and a unique mineral called Timonium, which led to the creation of a self-sustaining ecosystem powered by advanced AI technology. Massive domes were built to replicate Earth's environment and expedite energy exploitation.

Now, communication between Earth and Firos has ceased, and your elite squad is tasked with finding the black box of one of the missing domes. 

This thrilling adventure is perfect for families looking for a fun and immersive VR experience. Visit our VR café to book your session and embark on this epic quest together!

data.name: Coloniam
data.detailed_description:
THIS GAME IS A VIRTUAL REALITY EXPERIENCE ONLY

In Coloniam you colonize islands, build a variety of buildings, and manage resource production.
Create trade routes and ship goods between islands to expand your population.

Features:
Create and manage colonies on procedurally-generated islands.
Unlock different buildings by increasing the size of your colonies.
Build a variety of production and community buildings to meet the ever-increasing needs of your colonists.
Manage resources to keep your colonies profitable.
Build boats to colonize and establish trade routes with other islands.

Music by Richard Stottman.

data.ai_description:
**Coloniam: A Family-Friendly VR Adventure!**

Step into the immersive world of Coloniam, a virtual reality game where you and your family can colonize beautiful, procedurally-generated islands. Build a variety of structures, from cozy homes to bustling production buildings, and manage resources to keep your colonies thriving.

**Key Features:**
- **Explore and Expand:** Discover new islands and create flourishing colonies.
- **Unlock and Build:** Progress through the game to unlock exciting new buildings.
- **Community & Production:** Balance the needs of your colonists with both community and production facilities.
- **Resource Management:** Keep your colonies profitable by managing resources wisely.
- **Trade Routes:** Build boats to explore, colonize, and establish trade routes between islands.
- **Engaging Music:** Enjoy an enchanting soundtrack by Richard Stottman.

Perfect for all ages, Coloniam offers a fun and educational experience for families at your VR cafe!

data.name: Steamliner
data.detailed_description:
Steamliner is a VR Escape Room Adventure inside the carriages of a Victorian train flying through space. Each carriage has a different experience, from classic escape room puzzles to physics-defying surrealistic scenarios.

Tired of your daily routine? Same view every day? Well, come work for us at SL Unlimited Corp! What are we saying, work? We could hardly call it that when you will be boarding our quantum light speed express train experience extravaganza! See worlds you have never imagined!
What do we need from you? Just have fun... And a signed contract, since you’ll be preparing all of our carriages, in order to make sure accommodations are ready for our dear customers!

Key Features

  • Full 360 VR: The levels are designed with 360 degrees in mind, the player is able to move, turn and interact with objects anyway he wants.
  • Open Mind: Prepare to be challenged by out of the box solutions.
  • Available on Oculus Rift/S and HTC Vive.

Please, notice

Medium size room is recommended.

Release Notes

v1.3 | June 5th 2020
  • Main menu revamp;
  • Updated some 3D models;
  • Bug fixes and improvements.

v1.2.5 | April 29th 2020
  • Added locomotion option;
  • Oculus Quest Support;
  • EULA interaction tutorial;
  • "Crack It" level reworked;
  • Bug fixes and improvements.

**Steamliner** is a family-friendly VR Escape Room Adventure set inside the carriages of a Victorian train flying through space. Each carriage offers a unique experience, featuring everything from classic escape room puzzles to mind-bending, surreal scenarios.

**Key Features:**
- **Full 360 VR:** The levels are fully immersive, allowing players to move, turn, and interact with objects in any direction.
- **Creative Challenges:** Expect to solve puzzles with out-of-the-box solutions.
- **Platform Availability:** Available on Oculus Rift/S and HTC Vive.

**Please Note:**
- A medium-sized room is recommended for the best experience.

**Recent Updates:**
- **v1.3 (June 5th, 2020):** Main menu revamp, updated 3D models, and various bug fixes.
- **v1.2.5 (April 29th, 2020):** Added locomotion option, Oculus Quest support, EULA interaction tutorial, reworked "Crack It" level, and various bug fixes.

Bring your family to our VR cafe and embark on the Steamliner adventure, where fun and imagination know no bounds!
